org.patrodyne.scripting.java

Class JavaCodeScriptEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.script.AbstractScriptEngine
      • org.patrodyne.scripting.java.JavaCodeScriptEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Compilable, ScriptEngine, ScriptReader

    public class JavaCodeScriptEngine
extends AbstractScriptEngine
implements Compilable, ScriptReader
    This is script engine for Java programming language. Modified from the original to:
    • Format source.
    • Organize imports.
    • Parameterize raw types.
    • Change class name to differentiate from 'JavaScript'
    • Change system property prefix to 'org.patrodyne.scripting'
    Author:
    A. Sundararajan, Rick O'Sullivan
